home-participant.contactAdministrator: Please contact your administrator to get added to an assignment.

home-selector.inactivityLogout:
You will soon be logged out for security purposes. Please click "Continue" if you wish to continue your session.
 Otherwise, you will be automatically logged out in { timeLeft } seconds.

not-found.label: Return to Home
not-found.sorry: Sorry, we could not find that page!

signin.login: Log in to access your dashboard

game-tabs.heartsAndFlowersDescription: Match the correct side to the hearts and flowers.
game-tabs.introDescription: Learn how to play our games.
game-tabs.matrixReasoningDescription: Find the missing piece to complete the puzzle.
game-tabs.memoryGameDescription: Watch the squares light up. Remember the order and make the same pattern.
game-tabs.roarInferenceDescription: Read the stories and answer the questions.
game-tabs.sameDifferentSelectionDescription: Find things that are the same about the shapes.
game-tabs.surveyDescriptionChild: Answer questions about your time at school.
game-tabs.surveyDescriptionParentPart1: This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete and will ask questions about your child.
game-tabs.surveyDescriptionParentPart2: This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete and will ask questions about your home and yourself.
game-tabs.surveyDescriptionTeacherPart1: This survey will take approximately 5-10 minutes to complete and asks about your background and beliefs about teaching.
game-tabs.surveyDescriptionTeacherPart2: This survey will take approximately 5-10 minutes to complete and asks questions about the classroom(s) you teach.
game-tabs.theoryOfMindDescription: Listen to the stories and answer the questions.
game-tabs.trogDescription: Listen to the words and choose the matching picture.
game-tabs.vocabDescription: Listen to the word and choose the matching picture.

sentry-form.messagePlaceholder: What is the issue? What did you want to experience instead? Thank you for sharing.
